extendedInfo.description: Upward Mobility presents its exclusive NBPME Podiatry Part I Exam Prep app for Android!  Perfect to prepare you for the National Board of Podiatric Medical Examiners Exam.Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.This app contains 300 focused questions written exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert podiatric writers and all content undergoes a thorough review process.  Each question is paired with a thorough explanation to expand and reinforce the knowledge you need to pass the exam with flying colors.  This app covers all topics on the podiatry national board exam, including: General Anatomy; Lower Extremity Anatomy; Biochemistry; Physiology; Medical Microbiology and Immunology; Pathology; and Pharmacology.  When you pass this exam and are preparing for Part II of the Podiatry Boards, please keep in mind that we have an app for that too!Upward Mobility apps are designed with an exclusive intuitive UI. They provide a Study Mode, where questions are paired with clear explanations and the user can proceed at their own pace, as well as a Test Mode designed to simulate the exam experience, where the user can set question and time restraints and their results are presented to them upon completion in both an aggregate and a question-by-question format.This app is not affiliated with the National Board of Podiatric Medical Examiners.About Upward MobilityUpward Mobility is an independent test preparation and management education apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by subject matter expert writers and undergoes a thorough review process.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Questions are okay, seem very easy overall, but nice if you are out and about with a spare minute. Poorly written with bad grammar, misspelled words, letters left out, etc.; makes it hard to understand some questions. A few obvious answer errors. A better app would cost more, so ok with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good questions. Harder than the practice tests on apmle website. Eric, maybe you just haven\'t studied enough haha
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great app to practice from when in transit. Question difficulty ranges but they seem similar to the description we\'ve been given of the exam. Check it out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just bought this app and it\'s legit. Very convenient and the questions are definitely board relevant.
reviews.author: A Google User
